reviews.review_msg: She has great philosophy behind teaching math. She is very flexible and helpful. I only have good things to say about her.

Shiva is a horrible professor who should be fired from the university. I have received A's in math for my entire university career; I worked hard in this class, but because Shiva did not like me, I got a B+. Save yourself a headache and choose a different professor.
Shiva has no clear assessment criteria. She is an unfair marker. She needs to develop better teaching strategies and has a lot to learn about marking and teaching strategies.

Shiva, is not only a bad professor, but she seems to be a horrible person as well. Everyone has biases, but to allow them to blatantly effect your teaching practices and grading of students is disgusting. Her accent, understanding of the english, and choice of words is inadequate for this level of instruction; too much confusion.

Far too many unrealistic assignments. To give you an idea, one of the math assignments requires you to write a movie script, with different acts and scenes. The portfolio and journal assignments, worth a combined total of 30% was over 40 pages of pure writing.

Michael is passionate about math and knowledgeable about the Education system. He is supportive and caring about everyone's varying math experiences and changes the narrative to make it accessible. His problems are fun and he uses his expertise to prepare us for our future careers. The assignments are easy as long as you put in the work.

Terrible prof, don't recommend taking her class. Never marks anything so you don't know how you're doing in the class, then starts to make students mark assignments and still doesn't post grades. Teaches directly out of a textbook and never answers emails... Honestly, save yourself the hassle and money, buy the text and teach yourself.

Wow. Where to even start. During COVID, of course we were all forced online, so I could cut a little slack but I can't think that it would be any different in class. Gives out non-sense assignments. Her instructions are unclear. A lot of money to learn from a textbook - the only useful thing in this course. A TON OF WORK for no marks. Awful.

Would not recommend this professor. She does not actively teach her students anything, she gives assignments straight out of the textbook and the class is more writing than actually learning or practicing the skills necessary to teach. She gives unclear guidelines for assignments & does not frequently reply to emails for further clarifications.
